TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DynamicFieldDesigner extends System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataControlFieldDesigner

Docs.summary: Provides design-time support in a visual designer for the object.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance class System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField CreateField() cil managed

remarks.format: ## Remarks The CreateField method is called when the designer does not have schema information about the field.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance class System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField CreateField(class System.Web.UI.Design.IDataSourceFieldSchema fieldSchema) cil managed

Docs.param: Schema information that contains the structure of the data field.
Docs.summary: Creates a new object by using the specified data field information.

MemberSignature.Value: public override System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplateField CreateTemplateField (System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField dataControlField, System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl dataBoundControl);

.method public hidebysig virtual instance class System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplateField CreateTemplateField(class System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField dataControlField, class System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl dataBoundControl) cil managed

Docs.param: The data-bound control that contains the data field object.
Docs.summary: Creates a field for the specified data field.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The CreateTemplateField method is invoked by the designer when it converts a data control field into a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplateField> object.

Docs.summary: Gets the default text that is displayed for the data field in the fields editor.
Docs.value: The default text that is displayed for the data field in the fields editor.

Docs.summary: Gets the name that is displayed for the data field in the fields editor.
Docs.returns: The name that is displayed for the data field in the fields editor.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance string GetTemplateContent(class System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField dataControlField, valuetype System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControlMode mode) cil managed

Docs.param: The display mode for the specified data field.
Docs.summary: Gets the content of the template field.
Docs.returns: The content of the template field.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance bool IsEnabled(class System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl parent) cil managed

Docs.param: The data-bound control whose data control fields are being edited.
Docs.summary: Gets a value that indicates whether the data field is enabled in the fields editor.
Docs.returns: if the data field is enabled in the fields editor; if the data field will not be displayed in the fields editor.

remarks.format: ## Remarks If the IsEnabled method returns `false`, the data field will not be displayed in the fields editor. This occurs when the data-bound control does not contain the field yet

Docs.summary: Gets a value that indicates whether schema information is used to load the data fields.
